assignment.pkg4

Class Human

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment.pkg4.Human
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Player

    public class Human
extends java.lang.Object
implements Player
    A Human player object - Can read from and use methods from the pile - Can make moves in the Nim Game - Can be given a name - Knows its name

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Human(Pile pile)
      Create the Human player object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getName()
      getName is used to get the name variable of this class This method will be overriding the method of the Player Interface.
      void makeMove()
      makeMove is used to have the Human player make a play and remove a certain amount of marbles from the pile.
      void setName(java.lang.String name)
      setName is used to give a name to this Class This method will be overriding the method of the Player Interface.

      • Human

        public Human(Pile pile)
        Create the Human player object. This object can read from the pile and make decisions based on it.
